project_preview_description.text: This project focuses on building tools for novices and experts to extend assistive workflows while also scaffolding web accessibility learning experiences for computer science students.
Researchers: Anne Marie Piper, Thomas McHugh, and Cooper Barth

siteMetadata.title: Northwestern University
siteMetadata.description: Next Generation Content Production Tools for People with Vision Impairments.
siteMetadata.author: Northwestern Inclusive Technology Lab, Interactive Audio Lab, and Collab Lab
